fields.description:
When Using tez ui (makes REST api calls to timeline service REST api), some calls were coming back as 500 internal server error. The root cause was YARN-6654. This jira is to handle object decoding to prevent sending back internal server errors to the client and instead respond with a partial message instead.

{code}
2017-05-30 12:47:10,670 WARN org.apache.hadoop.yarn.webapp.GenericExceptionHandler: INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR
javax.ws.rs.WebApplicationException: java.lang.RuntimeException: java.io.IOException: java.lang.RuntimeException: unable to encodeValue class from code 1000

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: RollingLevelDBTimelineServer throws RuntimeException if object decoding ever fails runtime exception
